publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-316# Dr Sylvia Jackson: Mental Health Week 2003-That the Parliament recognises that Scottish Mental Health Week 2003 will take place from 6 to 12 October, including World Mental Health Day on 10 October; welcomes the various initiatives and activities taking place across Scotland during this time; congratulates Stirling and District Association for Mental Health and its Falkirk compatriots on the development of the "In-Touch" website, which will provide a database of services for those suffering from mental illness across the Forth Valley area, and congratulates the Scottish Executive for its successful "See Me" campaign, which is now entering its second year, and is helping to tackle the negative attitudes and stigma attached to mental illness in Scotland.
S2M-316# Mental Health Week 2003 (lodged on 9 September 2003) Johann Lamont*, Margaret Jamieson*

S2M-316# Dr Sylvia Jackson: Mental Health Week 2003â€”That the Parliament recognises that Scottish Mental Health Week 2003 will take place from 6 to 12 October, including World Mental Health Day on 10 October; welcomes the various initiatives and activities taking place across Scotland during this time; congratulates Stirling and District Association for Mental Health and its Falkirk compatriots on the development of the "In-Touch" website, which will provide a database of services for those suffering from mental illness across the Forth Valley area, and congratulates the Scottish Executive for its successful "See Me" campaign, which is now entering its second year, and is helping to tackle the negative attitudes and stigma attached to mental illness in Scotland. Supported by: Johann Lamont, Margaret Jamieson, Christine May*, Cathy Peattie*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Maureen Macmillan*, Michael McMahon*, Frances Curran*, Sarah Boyack*, Cathie Craigie*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Robin Harper*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-316# Mental Health Week 2003 (lodged on 9 September 2003) Pauline McNeill*, Jackie Baillie*, Elaine Smith*, Christine Grahame*, Rosie Kane*, Tommy Sheridan*, Donald Gorrie*, Bristow Muldoon*
S2M-316# Mental Health Week 2003 (lodged on 9 September 2003) Helen Eadie*, Scott Barrie*, Bill Butler*, John Swinburne*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Trish Godman*
S2M-316# Mental Health Week 2003 (lodged on 9 September 2003) Marilyn Livingstone*, Alex Neil*, Janis Hughes*, Irene Oldfather*
S2M-316# Mental Health Week 2003 (lodged on 9 September 2003) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-316# Mental Health Week 2003 (lodged on 9 September 2003) Brian Adam*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-316# Mental Health Week 2003 (lodged on 9 September 2003) Marlyn Glen*
